tasks.title: Welcome to Tasky!
tasks.description: This is your first task. You can edit it, move it to different columns, or delete it.

tasks.title: LLM agents can manage these tasks
tasks.description: Claude Code and other AI agents can directly edit this JSON file to add, update, or move tasks.

tasks.title: Customize your board
tasks.description: Add custom fields, create new boards, or modify columns as needed.
tasks.customField: You can add any custom fields you want!

tasks.title: Real-time file watching test
tasks.description: This task was added via Claude Code to test the real-time file watching feature!
